title: Davey Jones Locker
description: Creating an alternative history by imagining that the children of African slaves thrown overboard during the Middle Passage built a technologically advanced underwater civilization beneath the Atlantic Ocean, Detroit’s Drexciya were one of the key Afrofuturist duos of the 1990s. Their mythology and worldbuilding inspired many artsts, musicians and filmmakers - and their hard hitting electro and techno beats spread this mythology on the dancefloor.
